longBusinessSummary: Tilaknagar Industries Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of Indian made foreign liquor and its related products in India. The company offers brandy under the Mansion House and Courier Napoleon brands; rum under the Madiraa brand; whisky under the Mansion House and Senate Royale brands; gin under the Blue Lagoon brand; and extra neutral alcohol. It also exports its products in Africa, the Middle East, East and South-East Asia, and Europe. The company was incorporated in 1933 and is based in Mumbai, India.
